section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Association of the European self-medication industry (associate member) - AESGP
goals__remit: Boiron is the first manufacturer of homeopathic medicinal products in Europe. Its involvement at EU level aims at insuring that patients throughout Europe have access to the same high level of information on homeopathic medicines.
